snippet: Quazi Mohammad Rezwanul Ahsan Nafis pleaded guilty in a plot last year that involved an undercover federal agent.
abstract: Quazi Mohammad Rezwanul Ahsan Nafis of Bangladesh pleads guilty to 2012 plot to blow up Federal Reserve Bank of New York, bringing quick resolution to case that used one of the United States government's most popular strategies for identifying and pursuing terrorism suspects--undercover agents and a confidential source.
lead_paragraph: Quazi Mohammad Rezwanul Ahsan Nafis pleaded guilty in a plot last year that involved an undercover federal agent.

headline.seo: Nafis Admits Trying to Bomb Federal Reserve Bank in N.Y.
headline.main: Bangladeshi Admits Trying to Blow Up Federal Bank
headline.print_headline: Bangladeshi Admits Trying To Blow Up Federal Bank
